doc.field: Three children posing around a wicker chair. Arabic text on reverse: "Cuba, from your brother Nasri, picture of my children, Joseph, Emily, Philip Terali." 13.5 x 8.8 cm
Three children posing around a wicker chair. Arabic text on reverse: "Cuba, from your brother Nasri, picture of my children, Joseph, Emily, Philip Terali." 13.5 x 8.8 cm

Individual Studio Portrait Series - Three young children dressed in white, older male is standing next to the chair. Arabic writing on the back in black ink: "Cuba, from your brother Nasri, picture of my children, Joseph, Emily, Philip Terali." Augustin Alvarez Photography, Santiago, Cuba. 13.5 x 8.8 cm: 21 June 1912
